channel.title: Topology on Lars Wagoner
channel.description: Recent content in Topology on Lars Wagoner

item.title: Classification of Compact Surfaces
item.description: In this paper we will discuss a number of important theorems in topology, in particular the Seifert-van Kampen theorem and the classification of compact surfaces. The goal of this paper is to give the reader some intuition behind the classification theorem by studying certain topological spaces such as the n-fold torus and the m-fold projective plane. We begin by stating the Seifert-van Kampen theorem, which will serve as a foundation for the remaining results.
